newsitem.title: USA: Intel, InfoSpace in Internet phone pact.
newsitem.headline: Intel, InfoSpace in Internet phone pact.

text.p: Intel Corp will integrate its Internet Video Phone with InfoSpace Inc's People directory on the World Wide Web, InfoSpace said Tuesday.
Terms of the partnership were not disclosed.

Intel's Internet Video Phone allows Internet users to talk to and see each other while using other Internet applications, such as browsing the Web, exchanging photos or playing games, the companies said. Users will be able to download the free Internet phone from InfoSpace's site at http://www.infospace.com.
InfoSpace's People Directory offers access to over 100 million U.S. and Canadian telephone numbers and addresses.
